title: Pakistan PM Shehbaz to raise Kashmir, Palestine, Islamophobia issues at UNGA
content: Pakistan Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif is set to address the United Nations General Assembly on September 27. He will discuss issues including Jammu and Kashmir, Palestine, and rising Islamophobia. Last year, Pakistan highlighted Kashmir as essential for peace with India. India responded by calling for an end to cross-border terrorism and addressing human rights violations in Pakistan.
summary: Pakistan Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif is set to address the United Nations General Assembly on September 27. He will discuss issues including Jammu and Kashmir, Palestine, and rising Islamophobia. Last year, Pakistan highlighted Kashmir as essential for peace with India. India responded by calling for an end to cross-border terrorism and addressing human rights violations in Pakistan.

title: 'There’s more to talk about': Kamala Harris has a message for Donald Trump; watch video
content: Vice President Kamala Harris urged former President Donald Trump to engage in another debate on CNN next month. Despite Trump's refusal, citing ongoing voting, Harris emphasized the necessity of discussing issues and policies for American voters. With over a month remaining, she highlighted the race's closeness and her readiness for further debate.
summary: Vice President Kamala Harris urged former President Donald Trump to engage in another debate on CNN next month. Despite Trump's refusal, citing ongoing voting, Harris emphasized the necessity of discussing issues and policies for American voters. With over a month remaining, she highlighted the race's closeness and her readiness for further debate.

title: Will Trump make another run for President if he loses in 2024? Here's what he said
content: Donald Trump, 78, has declared he will not seek another presidential bid if he loses the November 5 election against Kamala Harris. The competition is tight, with Harris making gains in national polls. Trump continues to allege voter fraud in his 2020 loss and faces criminal charges over efforts to overturn those results.
summary: Donald Trump, 78, has declared he will not seek another presidential bid if he loses the November 5 election against Kamala Harris. The competition is tight, with Harris making gains in national polls. Trump continues to allege voter fraud in his 2020 loss and faces criminal charges over efforts to overturn those results.

title: GOP House speaker Mike Johnson axes Trump-backed bill linked to proof of citizenship for new voters
content: US House Speaker Mike Johnson presented a government funding bill without including the Save Act, which demands proof of citizenship for voter registration. The agreement extends funding until December 20, deferring further discussions until after the November 5 election. This move comes after an unsuccessful bid to merge voting provisions with a six-month funding extension.
summary: US House Speaker Mike Johnson presented a government funding bill without including the Save Act, which demands proof of citizenship for voter registration. The agreement extends funding until December 20, deferring further discussions until after the November 5 election. This move comes after an unsuccessful bid to merge voting provisions with a six-month funding extension.

title: Racial slur carved on student at Gettysburg College
content: Gettysburg College in Pennsylvania is investigating an incident involving two swim team members where a racial slur was scratched onto one student's chest during an informal gathering. The victim, who was later dismissed from the team, has not reported the matter to police. The college aims to turn this into a transformative moment for its community.
summary: Gettysburg College in Pennsylvania is investigating an incident involving two swim team members where a racial slur was scratched onto one student's chest during an informal gathering. The victim, who was later dismissed from the team, has not reported the matter to police. The college aims to turn this into a transformative moment for its community.

title: Charles did not like Diana's surprise Billy Joel dance, 'it was early sign of doomed marriage'
content: ​Anne Allan explained that there might be two reasons for Charles' displeasure. One, he's probably not a man who likes surprises; and two, probably he did not like his wife wearing a slinky dress, showing her body. " I’m not quite sure whether he thought it was the appropriate thing for Her Royal Highness the Princess of Wales."
summary: ​Anne Allan explained that there might be two reasons for Charles' displeasure. One, he's probably not a man who likes surprises; and two, probably he did not like his wife wearing a slinky dress, showing her body. " I’m not quite sure whether he thought it was the appropriate thing for Her Royal Highness the Princess of Wales."

title: Kennedy Jr portrays himself as the victim, Olivia Nuzzi's camp pushes back in sexting row
content: Many people have spoken in favor of Olivia that she has been singled out while what allegedly happened between her and Kennedy Jr was not that uncommon. "Everyone in DC knows who everyone is hooking up with and that Olivia Nuzzi is not unique in her situation. Such fake outrage," Emma-Jo Morris, editor, Breitbart News said.
summary: Many people have spoken in favor of Olivia that she has been singled out while what allegedly happened between her and Kennedy Jr was not that uncommon. "Everyone in DC knows who everyone is hooking up with and that Olivia Nuzzi is not unique in her situation. Such fake outrage," Emma-Jo Morris, editor, Breitbart News said.

title: Albania is planning a 'Vatican-style' sovereign enclave inside its capital
content: A Muslim cleric in Tirana, Albania, is set to lead what could become the world's smallest state, covering 27 acres and named the Sovereign State of the Bektashi Order. The enclave will promote religious tolerance and personal freedoms. Albanian PM Edi Rama supports this move to present a moderate version of Islam.
summary: A Muslim cleric in Tirana, Albania, is set to lead what could become the world's smallest state, covering 27 acres and named the Sovereign State of the Bektashi Order. The enclave will promote religious tolerance and personal freedoms. Albanian PM Edi Rama supports this move to present a moderate version of Islam.

title: California law to protect children from social media addiction
Donald Trump says he won't run for president in 2028 if he loses this November
content: Trump spoke about the roles that the three bigwigs in his team will play if he wins -- Kennedy Jr, Elon Musk and Tulsi Gabbard. He said Bobby will do great on health and environment, Elon Musk will cuts the waste and the fat in the country and Tulsi is a common sense person who will do terrific in his administration. "I have not made ant deals with anybody," Trump said.
summary: Trump spoke about the roles that the three bigwigs in his team will play if he wins -- Kennedy Jr, Elon Musk and Tulsi Gabbard. He said Bobby will do great on health and environment, Elon Musk will cuts the waste and the fat in the country and Tulsi is a common sense person who will do terrific in his administration. "I have not made ant deals with anybody," Trump said.

title: Trump's base in North Carolina divided over Robinson controversy
content: Trump supporters at a Wilmington rally were optimistic about his chances in North Carolina but divided over Lt. Gov. Mark Robinson's recent scandal involving past controversial comments. While some dismissed the allegations as media attacks, others expressed concern over their impact on his campaign. Many still supported Robinson for his political stance.
summary: Trump supporters at a Wilmington rally were optimistic about his chances in North Carolina but divided over Lt. Gov. Mark Robinson's recent scandal involving past controversial comments. While some dismissed the allegations as media attacks, others expressed concern over their impact on his campaign. Many still supported Robinson for his political stance.

title: Coldplay India concert 2025: BookMyShow crashes minutes before tickets go live; IRCTC and other memes flood internet
content: Thousands of fans faced frustration as BookMyShow crashed just before Coldplay concert tickets went on sale. The British band will perform in Mumbai's DY Patil Stadium in January 2025, marking their return to India after eight years. An additional show has been added due to high demand despite the technical issues.
summary: Thousands of fans faced frustration as BookMyShow crashed just before Coldplay concert tickets went on sale. The British band will perform in Mumbai's DY Patil Stadium in January 2025, marking their return to India after eight years. An additional show has been added due to high demand despite the technical issues.

title: Gretchen Whitmer calls Trump 'deranged' over his abortion remarks
content: Michigan Governor Gretchen Whitmer criticized former President Donald Trump during a CNN interview, calling him 'deranged' for his recent comments on abortion. Trump claimed that women would be happier and healthier if he were re-elected. Whitmer argued that Trump does not understand the daily challenges faced by women in America.
summary: Michigan Governor Gretchen Whitmer criticized former President Donald Trump during a CNN interview, calling him 'deranged' for his recent comments on abortion. Trump claimed that women would be happier and healthier if he were re-elected. Whitmer argued that Trump does not understand the daily challenges faced by women in America.

title: Usher deletes all his X posts after 'wild things' claim about Diddy: 'Hacked or damage control?'
content: ​With Diddy going down, several pop stars are now at stake with their previous involvement with Diddy. Reports claimed Justin Bieber was also a victim of Diddy's sexual assault. An X user shared the video in question in which a relatively young Justin appears alongside the rapper as the two speak about Justin not staying in touch with him. The user wrote in his post, “A video of Diddy having 15yo justin bieber stuttering when he asked why they don’t hang out no more is resurfacing online (sic)”.
summary: ​With Diddy going down, several pop stars are now at stake with their previous involvement with Diddy. Reports claimed Justin Bieber was also a victim of Diddy's sexual assault. An X user shared the video in question in which a relatively young Justin appears alongside the rapper as the two speak about Justin not staying in touch with him. The user wrote in his post, “A video of Diddy having 15yo justin bieber stuttering when he asked why they don’t hang out no more is resurfacing online (sic)”.

title: '5 petals of 'PUSHP' will make Viksit Bharat': PM Modi tells Indian diaspora in New York
content: The Indian diaspora in Delaware is excited about Prime Minister Narendra Modi's visit. They see themselves as cultural ambassadors of India. In his address, Modi emphasized unity, pride, and optimism while praising the diaspora's role in strengthening US-India relations. He also discussed India's recent elections and his vision for a developed India.
summary: The Indian diaspora in Delaware is excited about Prime Minister Narendra Modi's visit. They see themselves as cultural ambassadors of India. In his address, Modi emphasized unity, pride, and optimism while praising the diaspora's role in strengthening US-India relations. He also discussed India's recent elections and his vision for a developed India.

title: 'We all know...': Melania Trump snubbed for her Christmas Ornament series
content: Melania is very much present everywhere apart from her husband's election campaign. She is releasing teasers for her upcoming memoir speaking about Donald Trump, their son Barron, her past profession of a fashion model where she shot nude photos as well. But the Christmas ornaments did not go down well with the social media users who commented, “We all know what you REALLY think about Christmas."
summary: Melania is very much present everywhere apart from her husband's election campaign. She is releasing teasers for her upcoming memoir speaking about Donald Trump, their son Barron, her past profession of a fashion model where she shot nude photos as well. But the Christmas ornaments did not go down well with the social media users who commented, “We all know what you REALLY think about Christmas."

title: GOP senator Lindsey Graham says 'porn site' charges against Mark Robinson beyond unnerving but...
content: North Carolina Lt Gov Mark Robinson is accused of making offensive online comments, which he denies. GOP Senator Lindsey Graham finds the charges unnerving and suggests legal action if untrue. Prominent Republicans urge Robinson to prove his innocence, while Democrats criticize his connection to Donald Trump. “Mark Robinson could not exist without the support of Donald Trump,” North Carolina Attorney General Josh Stein said
summary: North Carolina Lt Gov Mark Robinson is accused of making offensive online comments, which he denies. GOP Senator Lindsey Graham finds the charges unnerving and suggests legal action if untrue. Prominent Republicans urge Robinson to prove his innocence, while Democrats criticize his connection to Donald Trump. “Mark Robinson could not exist without the support of Donald Trump,” North Carolina Attorney General Josh Stein said

title: Final debate showdown: Will Trump let Vance take the spotlight?
content: JD Vance and Tim Walz, running mates for Donald Trump and Kamala Harris respectively, are scheduled to debate on October 1. This will be the sole vice presidential debate of the campaign season. Speculations are emerging about whether Trump wants Vance or himself to participate in a final debate before early voting begins.
summary: JD Vance and Tim Walz, running mates for Donald Trump and Kamala Harris respectively, are scheduled to debate on October 1. This will be the sole vice presidential debate of the campaign season. Speculations are emerging about whether Trump wants Vance or himself to participate in a final debate before early voting begins.

title: Tulsi Gabbard recalls when she was told 'how dare you meet Donald Trump' in 2016
content: Tulsi Gabbard recalled when she first met Donald Trump in 2016 as a Democratic leader two weeks after his election even before his swearing in. She said she was criticized by her party for meeting Donald Trump because the Democratic Party and the mainstream media demonize Donald Trump, making him look like a Hitler-like caricature.
summary: Tulsi Gabbard recalled when she first met Donald Trump in 2016 as a Democratic leader two weeks after his election even before his swearing in.  She said she was criticized by her party for meeting Donald Trump because the Democratic Party and the mainstream media demonize Donald Trump, making him look like a Hitler-like caricature.

title: Police officer dies in Pakistan blast during foreign diplomats' security operation
